price: Cyangwa akabagwa gitumo bajya cyangwa bava (mu mirimo yabo), uko byagenda kose ntibananirana (nta ho bacikira ibihano bya Allah).
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
